Title: Art House Gallery and Cultural Center

BAMPFA is a large scale art gallery specialising in contemporary installation The space also houses the Pacific Film archive has an open library space and a cafe It is closely tied to the University of California Berkeley Price of entry $10 regular free for students Opening times 10 until 6 https://bampfa.org/
The Magnes Collection of Jewish Art and Life
Phoebe A. Hearst Museum of Anthropology
